name: NATIONAL FOUNDATION FOR THE CENTERS FOR DISEASE CONTROL AND PREVENTION
description: Independent, nonprofit that forges partnerships between the CDC and private sector.
sampleDescriptions: Public health issues; H5N1 and measles outbreak and response
